shots.prompt: INT. COCKPIT - DEEP SPACE. Elara (30s, short, dark, practical haircut, tired but curious grey eyes, worn dark blue flight suit with silver accents) stares out the main viewport at distant, cold stars. Muted blues and sterile whites dominate the cockpit's interior. Cinematic, wide shot. Soft, ambient blue lighting from consoles.
shots.negative: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, inconsistent character appearance, poor lighting, bad composition, overexposed, underexposed, cartoonish, anime

shots.prompt: EXT. DEEP SPACE - VIEWPORT. The main viewport is filled with a breathtaking, impossibly bright NEBULA, blooming with swirling hues of emerald, violet, and gold. Inside the cockpit, Elara (30s, short, dark, practical haircut, tired but curious grey eyes, worn dark blue flight suit with silver accents) leans forward, captivated, her face illuminated by the nebula's light. Cinematic, wide shot. Dramatic lighting.
